name: Spy 4k
description:
Spy 4k is an port of the game Spy by Nick Kouvaris. The binary size of the complete game including graphics and music data is exactly 4096 bytes, therefore the appendix "4k" in the game title.

The play-field is an 18x18 sized board. Each field contains a number or a bomb. Moving on a field with a number, the players avatar is automatically moving the amount of fields further like stated on the field (e.g. entering a field with a "4", four additional fields are crossed). The goal is to move a specific amount of fields without moving on a bomb or reaching a board border without having all the moves finished. Having reached the specified amount of moves of a level, the next level with higher requirement of moves is starting.

shot.caption: The player controls the green blob. Moving left on "1" will move an additional 1 field.
Moved the required amount of fields. Level finished
Locked! Either 5 to the right or 4 to the bottom will reach the border before the moves are finished, which is Game Over
Game Over is also happening if moving in a bomb
